oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Métis in Alberta - Les Métis en Alberta
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: History
Local History
Communities
Social History
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Explore the rich history of the first Francophone community in Alberta through The Métis in Alberta, a fully bilingual website showcasing the origins, the people, and the culture of the Métis who have helped shaped this province into what it is today.
